question: What on-chain metrics can be found on ergo.watch?
What is required to be included on defillama.com/chain/Ergo?
How can developers have their contributions recognized in the yearly report by developerreport.com and the weekly-updated Artemis dashboard?
answer: Add your GitHub organization or repositories to this repository: https://github.com/electric-capital/crypto-ecosystems/blob/master/data/ecosystems/e/ergo.toml.

question: What is the purpose of the Artemis dashboard?
answer: It provides weekly-updated developer activity for the Ergo ecosystem.

question: What is the purpose of the developerreport.com yearly report?
answer: It recognizes developer contributions to the Ergo ecosystem.
